name: Prey (itch)
description:
Living the life of a bacteria eating worm, are you ready to find your Prey?

*Disclaimer:

This is a quick little messing around sample to get used to the flow with CF2.5 for the 2 day #IWantToCreate gamejam

Why:

Working around the clock on our upcoming title Abduction, I felt it was time to start contributing to some gamejams and to burn off some energy!

Want to know more about us? Follow us @RedIronLabs or check out our website.
